ctx: induction l as [| e es IH].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros l i H. induction l as [| e es IH]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct H as [H1 H2]. specialize (IH H2). destruct IH as [IH1 IH2]. clear IH. split. + destruct es as [| e' es']. * simpl. simpl in H1. auto. * intros e'' Hin. apply H1. apply removeAfterIndex_in in Hin. apply Hin. + apply IH2.
